Welcome to our very special place

Fuji exudes a laid-back atmosphere, perfect for dinner with the family or a night out with friends. So come join our friendly staff any day of the week for delicious cocktails and mouth-watering eats.

When it comes to your next event, let us take care of the food with our delicious and expertly crafted catering options featuring a wide range of our impeccable dishes that are sure to please any palate.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - google

Sharlette C:
five star review by 
Great experience. They told us it would be a 25 minute wait for a table but it was really less than 10. The spicy pomegranate margarita was fantastic as well as the gyoza. All three of the rolls we got were also delicious and were very large. Decent happy hour specials, even on Friday.

Review by - google

Caroline S:
five star review by 
Really good sushi and great lunch specials! I had the shrimp and vegetables tempura bento box and it was very plentiful! I couldn't even eat it all! My husband had the 'resolution roll' and really loved it by warns its very spicy! So, if you like heat, go for that one! They've always got great specials going. There is a nice outside area to sit and the inside is very cozy with a small bar area. It's got a great neighborhood feel to it!

Review by - google

Abigail W:
five star review by 
I ordered take out and was really happy with my food. Got a shrimp tempura roll and avocado and cucumber roll. The shrimp tempura was cooked perfectly, super crispy and flavorful. The avocado and cucumber roll was incredibly fresh. They also provided a generous side of ginger and wasabi. Received way more pieces per roll than I was expecting which made it a fair price in my opinion. Looking forward to ordering again soon!

Review by - google

Arturo G:
five star review by 
I'm glad my friends brought me to Fuji, first time being here and all I can say is that everything was amazing the service and the food. We had many different dishes and all were great! Definitely will be coming regularly and I recommend this place.
